snippet: A plan to install parking meters on one San Francisco street has brought accusations that the city is making parking easier for the wealthy and mistreating people in poorer neighborhoods.
lead_paragraph: A plan to install parking meters on one San Francisco street has brought accusations that the city is making parking easier for the wealthy and mistreating people in poorer neighborhoods.

headline.seo: San Francisco Parking Meters Rouse Outcry of Unfairness to the Poor
headline.main: Parking Meters Rouse Outcry of Unfairness to Poor
headline.print_headline: Parking Meters Rouse Outcry of Unfairness to Poor
